wikipedia_page.main: David Thomson Robb (born 15 December 1947) is a Scottish former football player best known for playing for Aberdeen.

response: * David Davie Robb (born 1947), Scottish former footballer

The 1976 Scottish League Cup Final was played on 6 November 1976 and was the final of the 31st Scottish League Cup competition. It was contested by Aberdeen and Celtic. Aberdeen won the match 2–1, thanks to goals by Drew Jarvie and Davie Robb.
* Davie Robb (born 1947), Scottish association football player
